Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic epistolary text on recto (28 ll.) and verso (7 ll. + 1 l. with address). Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Letter addressed by Harprecht to the secretary of Heriubast the chief of police (?). Date. year 22, Tybi 16 (or 26) [of Ptol. Philometor] = BC. 159 Feb. 15 (or 25). Origin. Serapeum, Memhphis".
Bibliographic references: Revillout 1888 / Papyrus Démotiques du British Museum, Premier Fascicule (p.3-4, pl.4)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (43930) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/43930)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss Black ink Inlaid: white paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (cracked) Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
